btn_sites_create_title.message: Create a new site tmplate from the current tab..

btn_sites_example_title.message: Open a sample article page of this site..

btn_sites_import_title.message: Import the site template for the current tab from server..

btn_sites_publish_title.message: Publish this site template to server..

btn_sites_try_title.message: Test this site template on current tab..

confirm_app_subscription.message:
Warning: $msg$

Please visit 'Chrome Web Store' site to get license by subscribing to 'TTS Scribd Reader', with the subscription you will have full access to this extension and get the latest update.

confirm_create_site.message: Site '$host$' is not found, do you want to create it now?

confirm_granted_oauth2.message:
'TTS Scribd Reader' needs permission to verify your license.
Please click on 'OK' to grant OAuth2 to 'TTS Scribd Reader' extension.

Need help? Please visit online tutorial:
https://github.com/ttsreadit/ttsreadit/wiki/oauth2

confirm_sign_in_to_chrome.message:
'TTS Scribd Reader' needs permission to verify your license.
Please click on 'OK' to sign in to Chrome with your Google account.

Need help? Please visit online tutorial:
https://github.com/ttsreadit/ttsreadit/wiki/oauth2

dialog_update_user_info_desc.message: To save your site templates, please update your user info:

edit_sites_search.message: Enter a host name and press enter to search

error_article_no_template.message:
Warning: 'TTS Scribd Reader' failed to retrieve site template from server,

Please check your internet connection, then try again.

error_load_site_template.message: Failed to get site template, site:'$host$', error:'$err$'

error_no_site_template.message: There is no site template '$host$'. Please click on popup icon to report this issue

error_parse_json.message: Failed to parse JSON data, error: '$err$', JSON: '$json$'

extDesc.message: Powered by Google TTS (Text to Speech), turns your Scribd e-books into audible books

extName.message: TTS Reader: Speak Scribd Books Aloud

icon_sites_published_title.message: The site template is published already

icon_sites_verified_title.message: The site template is verified already

issue_auth_page_not_loaded.message: Authorization page could not be loaded.

issue_license_is_expired.message: Your 'TTS Scribd Reader' license has expired.

issue_no_license.message: You don't have 'TTS Scribd Reader' license.

issue_no_site_template.message: There is no template for this site.

issue_user_not_sign_in.message: The user is not signed in.

label_copyrights.message: Copyright 2017 Web Gadgets Inc. All rights reserved.

label_issue_enable_feedback.message: Also copy the issue detail, then paste on 'TTS Scribd Reader' feedback page.

label_settings_popup_enable.message: Show popup translation when text selected.

label_settings_tts_max_length.message: Set max size of a sentence:

label_settings_tts_scroll_title.message: Scroll the reading paragraph into view

label_settings_tts_visual_title.message: Set visual feedback on the web page during reading

label_settings_useremail.message: Set email for the latest updates:

label_settings_username.message: Set owner name of your templates:

news_auto_translation.message: Don't stop by the foreign web sites which language you don't understand, 'Read-It' can translate and read the whole article back to you with the language you know.

news_change_translation_lanugage.message: If you prefer the other language for 'TTS Scribd Reader' to translate and read, you can open 'Settings' tab and change the translation language you like

news_open_foreign_site.message: Click the link blow to open a foreign news site:

news_read_in_language.message: When the page is loaded, right click on the page, select "'TTS Scribd Reader'" => "Read the article in 'English'..", then you will hear the voice is reading the article in English

question_delete_site_template.message: Do you want to remove site template '$1'?

report_issue_no_template.message: Can't find site template '$host$', on the page '$url$', and additional note '$note$'

report_issue_no_text.message:
'TTS Scribd Reader' can read text books, but can't read the books that are scaned/printed into graphic books.
If you are sure this book is text book, you can submit an issue report, we will fix the issue asap, following data will be submitted:

$1

report_issue_other_issues.message: There are some issues with site template '$host$', on the page '$url$', and additional note '$note$'

report_issue_wrong_template.message: There are some issues with site template '$host$', fields '$fields$ are incorrect, on the page '$url$', and additional note '$note$'

text_not_reading.message: 'TTS Scribd Reader'  is not reading anything.

text_publish_site_template_failed.message: 'TTS Scribd Reader' failed to publish site template, Host: '$host$', error: '$err$'

text_publish_site_template_succeeded.message:
'TTS Scribd Reader'  published site template successfully.
Site: '$site$'

text_voice_exmaple_body.message: Antelope Valley California Poppy Reserve reports:

tutorial_control_playback.message: Now you can explore the tabs on the top of this window, select 'Reading' tab, for controling reading playback

tutorial_create_templates.message: Select 'Sites' tab, for creating or modifying the site templates

tutorial_grant_oauth2.message: When the page is loaded, right click on the page and select 'Read the article..', You will be prompted for granting OAuth2 to 'TTS Scribd Reader', because 'TTS Scribd Reader' needs your permission to validate license, please click OK to continue; you might need to right click menu on the page and select 'Read the article..' again, then you will hear a voice is reading the page.

tutorial_modify_settings.message: Select 'Settings' tab, for controlling the reading options

tutorial_open_news_site.message: Then check out an article on the popular news site:

tutorial_open_tryout_site.message: First check out the tryout site: NASA.GOV, an article about 'Cloudy sky':

tutorial_right_click_menu.message: When the page is loaded, right click on the page, select 'TTS Read-It! - Article to Speech' => 'Read the article..'; you will hear a voice is reading the article.

tutorial_title.message: Quick tutorial on how to use 'TTS Scribd Reader'
